attributes.action: Make Mr D.Birkett Head Coach of England National football team
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the abject failure of the FA to appoint a man of integrity, intellectual ability and football knowledge to this key position-we support the claim that the only person capable of restoring our national game to its rightful position is Mr D.Birkett

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
